title: Does This Sound Familiar?
subtitle: Many retailers struggle daily with these challenges when managing non-merchandise products.

items.title: 4+ Hours Per Week in Excel
items.description: You waste valuable time on manual Excel lists instead of focusing on your core business.

items.title: Article Numbers Never Found
items.description: When you need them, SKUs are never there. Constant searching in outdated catalogs.

items.title: Over or Under Ordering
items.description: Ordering mistakes lead to excess inventory or critical stockouts. No overview of demand.

items.title: Outdated Catalogs
items.description: Printed or PDF catalogs are outdated as soon as they're created. Changes reach nobody.

items.title: Not Mobile Accessible
items.description: Your branch employees can't access product data on the go. Everything must happen at the PC.

items.title: No Standards
items.description: Each branch orders by gut feeling. No uniform processes, no control.

callout.title: This costs you not only time, but also money.
